content:
Here's a sad song with notes for you:

Verse 1:
C D E E E D C C
The rain falls down on me
C D E E E D C C
As I stand alone, can't you see?
C D E F E D C C
The tears mix with the rain
C D E F E D C C
And I feel this pain, again and again

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Verse 2:
C D E E E D C C
The memories flood my mind
C D E E E D C C
Of the laughter we left behind
C D E F E D C C
But now it's just emptiness
C D E F E D C C
I can't find my way, in this darkness

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Bridge:
G G A A B B A G
I wish I could turn back time
G G A A B B A G
To when you were still mine
G G A A B B A G
But now I'm left with this pain
G G A A B B A G
And the memories that remain

Chorus:
G G G G A G F
Why did you have to go?
G G G G A G F
Leaving me with this sorrow
G G G G A G F
I'll always be missing you
G G G G A G F
My heart will never be new

Outro:
C D E E E D C C
The rain keeps falling down
C D E E E D C C
And I'm left to drown
C D E F E D C C
In this sea of tears and pain
C D E F E D C C
And I'll never be the same.
